Package Phase2

Class Bot

  • java.lang.Object
    • Phase2.Bot
  • public class Bot
extends java.lang.Object
    The Bot class represents a bot player in the Tetris game. It uses a set of weights to make decisions on where to place the Tetris pieces.

      • getAllPossibleDrops

        public void getAllPossibleDrops​(int[][] afield,
                                int[][] currentPiece)
        Calculates all possible drops for the current piece on the game field. Each drop is represented as a map containing various criteria values. The drops are stored in a list and later used to determine the best move.
        Parameters:
        afield - The game field represented as a 2D array.
        currentPiece - The current piece represented as a 2D array.

      • calculateBestMove

        public int calculateBestMove​(java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object>> drops)
        Calculates the best move from a list of drops. The best move is determined by the highest score calculated using the calculateScore method. Updates the currentBestRotation and currentBestXPos variables with the rotation and xpos of the best move.
        Parameters:
        drops - the list of drops to evaluate
        Returns:
        the index of the best move in the drops list

      • performBestDrop

        public void performBestDrop()
        Performs the best drop by moving the current piece to the best position and rotation, and then dropping it.

      • baseCases

        public void baseCases()
        Executes the base cases for the Tetris game. The base cases include specific actions for different current piece IDs. - If the current piece ID is 2, it rotates right and drops the piece. - If the current piece ID is 10, it rotates right, moves right twice, and drops the piece. - If the current piece ID is 8, it rotates right twice and drops the piece. - If the current piece ID is 3, it rotates left three times, moves right twice, and drops the piece. - If the current piece ID is 7, it rotates right twice, moves right, and drops the piece. - If the current piece ID is 11, it rotates right and drops the piece.

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
